limit1Exceeded.title: Limit 1 exceeded
limit1Exceeded.description: True if configured limit 1 is exceeded

limit2Exceeded.title: Limit 2 exceeded
limit2Exceeded.description: True if configured limit 2 is exceeded

limit3Exceeded.title: Limit 3 exceeded
limit3Exceeded.description: True if configured limit 3 is exceeded

ullage.title: Ullage
ullage.description: Distance measured between the sensor and the surface

srssi.title: Sonic Received Signal Strength Indicator
srssi.description: The SRSSI is an integer number between 1 (low level) and 10 (expected level) given to the expected strength of the echo reflected to the transducer.

src.title: Sonic Results Code – a performance metric of the ultrasonic measurement
src.description: The SRC represents the result code of the ultrasonic algorithm which can be used to deduce whether a reading is likely to be valid or not. An SRC of 9 or 10 are optimal.
